entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
